sys_hub_flow.description:
In this part of the challenge, you apply what you have learned in this module to create a scheduled flow to check for overdue NeedIt Tasks, close the overdue tasks, update the work notes for the task with a reason, and log the automatic closure.
Create the flow as part of the NeedIt application. Run the flow weekly on Fridays at 11 pm. Get the value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be to automatically close it. Use the Get Days Ago Date action to calculate the overdue date to compare against due dates. Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the property. Update each overdue NeedIt Task with the Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks subflow. Pass the Number of the NeedIt Task record in the Subflow's Reason input. Save and test the flow. View the NeedIt Task records and the System Log to verify results.
sys_hub_flow.name: Needit Challenge

Get the value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be to automatically close it. Use the Get Days Ago Date action to calculate the overdue date to compare against due dates. Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the property. Update each overdue NeedIt Task with the Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks subflow. Pass the Number of the NeedIt Task record in the Subflow's Reason input. Save and test the flow. View the NeedIt Task records and the System Log to verify results.
sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: Needit Challenge
